data.message: I'M A VERY NEW FACEBOOK USER N MY SONS Isaiah Conaway  N MALCOLM HALL JR., BOTH USERS R THE ONES WHO CONVINCED ME TO TRY ...BEING AS I AM SUCH A PRIVATE PERSON, I'VE NOW AM TRYN N LEARNING N LIKE IT THE MORE N MORE I LEARN! BUT, NOT A HUGE COMPUTER FAN THO SO, I'M A MOBILE USER N I DO NOW LIKE IT! SO DON'T KNOCK IT TILL YA TRY IT LOL :)  N ALWAYS, SMILE WHEN U THINK OF ME! BABYGIRL 2015'

replies.message: We're so happy you're here, Heather! Thanks for sharing. -Hailey
Don't give up too much of your privacy. You are new to this and it can be quite invasive if you aren't careful.
Yeah. Facebook is worse than the NSA

Watch out for all the SCAMS. I have "TRIED" to be SCAMED a few times. Watch out for the ROMANCE SCAMS, NIGERIA 419 SCAMS. Please Do a search on it. I Googled it. Learned a lot. But i block them and they keep coming back to try. I think its becaue i have Widowed in my info. Which i am about to change. Maybe the SCAMERS will finally leave. Good luck and have fun with it. :-) Peace
Beat me to it there, Daniel. Dan the Man. D-Bag!
